label: Harbor seal (from shore)
description: Seal resting or swimming at a distance.
safety_note: Observe from shore; never approach or surround.

label: Kelp blade
description: Washed-up seaweed blade (leave it where it is).
safety_note: Do not remove attached living algae.

label: Crab molt
description: Empty crab shell or pieces in wrack line.
safety_note: Leave in place for recycling nutrients.

label: Eelgrass tangle
safety_note: Leave seagrass in place; habitat value.

label: Cormorant or gull
safety_note: Avoid flushing birds; keep distance.

label: Boat wake lines
description: Water ripples after a boat passes.
safety_note: Stay well back from water’s edge.

label: Driftwood with roots
safety_note: Never climb on unstable logs.

label: Shoreline current line
description: A line of foam or debris marking current.
safety_note: Observe from a safe lookout.

label: Foghorn or bell sound
description: Hear a navigation aid or ship horn.
safety_note: Choose safe listening spot.

label: Harbor porpoise (maybe!)
description: Small, quick surfacing at a distance.
safety_note: Do not wait at unsafe spots; move on if cold/tired.

label: Bird on a wire
description: Perched bird on a line or branch.
safety_note: Observe quietly; don’t throw food.

label: Cone or seed pod
safety_note: Leave where you found it unless park rules allow collecting.

label: Ant trail
safety_note: Do not disturb nests.

label: Moss or lichen
safety_note: Do not peel off living moss/lichens.

label: Three leaf shapes
safety_note: Do not pick from private property.

label: Cloud type
description: Note a cloud type you can name later.
safety_note: Sun safety.

label: Insect sound
safety_note: Do not chase or capture.

label: Squirrel or urban wildlife
safety_note: Observe quietly; don’t feed wildlife.

label: Street tree tag
safety_note: Respect city property.

label: Micro-habitat under a shrub
safety_note: Do not disturb nests; hands off soil in private gardens.
